entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Alliston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:46 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries near noon. Periods of light snow beginning early this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain showers or drizzle changing to snow late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
